name: Dragon I
description:
This is Dragon I the first chapter in the series. 

Features

  • Lost of collectable items
  • Multitude of  character skins
  • Moderate sized world map
  • MS Paint Graphics :D

This version is also 2.0 just thought that might be worth pointing out.

Disclaimer - I do not own some of the assets used in this game but that being said I created majority but not all of the assets.
